Types

CombinedError = object of CatchableError
  errors*: seq[ref Exception]
An error which combines multiple error messages into one.   Source   Edit 
ConvertException = object of CatchableError
An error which occurs during conversion. More detailed information is from extending Exceptions.   Source   Edit 
ConvertOptions = object
  bundle*: bool              ## All output files should instead be bundles (if the output type supports it).
  songFolders*: bool         ## If it should create a folder for each song (artist & title).
  jsonPretty*: bool          ## If the output-type is json based, if it should format it prettyly
  keep*: bool                ## If it should keep the original meta-data when merging a file
  merge*: bool ## If the output-type supports multiple charts to be in a single file,
               ## if it should merge existing and new charts together.
  output*: string            ## The output directory where it should write the files to
  preserve*: bool            ## If it should preserve any existing output-files.
                             ## Doesn't save the convertion at all then.
  resources*: bool ## If it should copy over all referenced resources (audio, graphics, etc.) 
                   ## to the charts output folder.
  normalize*: bool           ## If it should normalize the output-paths (folder/file).
  folderFormat*: string      ## The format for chart/folders (if enabled).
  chartFormat*: string       ## The format for the chart file.
Options for converting one chart-file to another type   Source   Edit 
ConvertResult = object
  folderName*: string ## The folder-name in which the file has been put into.
                      ## It's only the directory name.
                      ## For a full-path, use `filePath` instead.
  filePath*: string          ## Absolute file-path to the file.
Result from converting a chart-file   Source   Edit 
FileType {.pure.} = enum
  Memo = "memo", Memo2 = "memo2", Malody = "malody", StepMania = "stepmania",
  FXF = "fxf"
File types which are supported   Source   Edit 
FormattingParameters = object
  title*: string
  artist*: string
  difficulty*: string
  extension*: string
Parameters to format a folder or chart.   Source   Edit 
InvalidTypeException = object of ConvertException
  file*: string              ## The file that was attempted to be converted.
  inputType*: FileType       ## The fileType which has no available convertions.
Exception which occurs when the converter does not have a convertion available for the input type.   Source   Edit 
MissingConversionException = object of ConvertException
  file: string               ## The file that was attempted to be converted.
  inputType*: FileType       ## The fileType from where it attempted to convert from.
  outputType*: FileType      ## The fileType to where it attmepted to convert to.
Exception which occurs when it's not possible to convert from the input type to the requested output type.   Source   Edit 
MissingTypeException = object of ConvertException
Exception which occurs when no input type was provided and/or couldn't be determined automatically.   Source   Edit 
ParseError = object of CatchableError
Error which occurs when parsing of a file failed.   Source   Edit 
PreserveFileException = object of ConvertException
Exception which occurs when the options have preserve enabled, and the output-file already exists.   Source   Edit

Consts

DefaultChartFormat = "%artist% - %title%_%difficulty%.%ext%"
Default format for charts which have a separate file per difficulty   Source   Edit 
DefaultFolderFormat = "%title% (%artist%)"
Default format for folders   Source   Edit 
DefaultNonDifficultyChartFormat = "%artist% - %title%.%ext%"
Default format for charts which have all difficulties in one file   Source   Edit 
OneMinute = 60000
One minute in milliseconds. Used for various time convertions   Source   Edit 
PlaceholderArtist = "%artist%"
Placeholder for the charts artist   Source   Edit 
PlaceholderDifficulty = "%difficulty%"
Placeholder for the charts difficulty   Source   Edit 
PlaceholderExtension = "%ext%"
Placeholder for the file extension   Source   Edit 
PlaceholderTitle = "%title%"
Placeholder for the charts song-title   Source   Edit
